evidence.claim: I-PASS utilizes AWS cloud infrastructure for reliable performance and scalability.
The I-PASS system is designed to adhere to HIPAA regulations, ensuring patient data security and privacy.
I-PASS supports HL7 and FHIR standards for interoperability between different health information systems.
Integration with EHRs is a key feature of the I-PASS platform, utilizing specific transaction sets like X12 for data exchange.
The I-PASS platform leverages GCP for data analytics and storage solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction use or API automation for eligibility or claims processing.
